title: Information Literacy Competency Enhancement Process Through Collaborative Inquiry and Production

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Language education-linked program for elementary education majors in graduate school, supporting collaborative learning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design and apply the entire process of information collection, analysis, and reorganization to educational contexts.
Learners enhance their ability to evaluate diverse information sources and select reliable materials through collaborative project execution.
Learners can creatively express and share information using digital production tools (mind maps, presentations, multimedia editors, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
